member.name: M:Gtp.Framework.Condition.#ctor(Gtp.Framework.ComparisonType,System.Object,System.Object,Gtp.Framework.StyleCollection,Gtp.Framework.StyleAffects)
member.summary: Applies a pre-defined style into a row or cell which its stipulated column provides a given condition
member.param: Comparision Type (use ComparisonType enum)
First value of the comparision. It can't be empty
Optional. Second value of the comparision operation. Can be used with Between and NotBetween operators (If it's empty use ComparisonType.None enum)
Pre-defined decoration. It can be one of the StyleCollection enum's values
Affect area of the style. If it's StyleAffects.Row, Style will be applied all of the columns of the row

member.name: T:Gtp.Framework.ConditionCollection
member.summary: Condition list for all collections in a table

member.name: M:Gtp.Framework.Decoration.#ctor(System.String,Gtp.Framework.EditTypes,Gtp.Framework.SummaryTypes,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Formats or adds some specific functions on a grid column
member.param: Header caption of the column
Edit and Display Format of the column which its control type given by the EditTypes enum
Adds a summary cell under the column. SummaryTypes enum provides possible format types
Width of the column
Decimal digit count of a number
Makes the column Editable/UnEditable
Hides/Unhides the column
Visible Column Index
Wraps or remains plain the text in a cell
Format string of column. It overrides the default value. Date, Integer, Currency, Decimal Controls could be formatted by this
Combo Source DataTable Name which its data takes place in same DataSet
Data Source column(s) of the combobox. This column is not shown in the combo box
Displayed column(s) of the combobox. User selects this value from the combo box
